name: westlaw-connector
description: Westlaw legal research integration with KeyCite, documents, and statutes
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: Westlaw Connector
card.description: Legal research with KeyCite, case law, and statutes

summary.overview: Westlaw legal research integration with document search, KeyCite citation validation, case law research, statute annotations, and secondary sources.
summary.exampleUseCase: Search case law by topic, KeyCite citations to check validity and negative treatment, retrieve annotated statutes, and access secondary sources for legal analysis.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Direct Westlaw API access with your Thomson Reuters credentials. Pairs with LexisNexis connector for comprehensive legal research coverage across platforms.
